JobFullDesc: The Streaming Solutions Engineer will be responsible for supporting all aspects of streaming for high priority live events and multiple facets of a video streaming workflow from real-time ingestion to Facebook and external platforms. This includes video transmission via hardware and cloud-based encoders. Facebook is seeking a candidate that has deep and broad knowledge of streaming technologies and is familiar with modern streaming protocols.
